text: Tumhari halat us aurat ki si na ho jaye jisne aap hi mehnat se soot kaata (spun yarn) aur phir aap hi usey tukde tukde kar dala. Tum apni kasamo ko aapas ke maamlaat mein makar o fareb ka hathiyar banate ho taa-ke ek qaum dusri qaum se badhkar faiyde hasil karey halaanke Allah is ahad o paimaan ke zariye se tumko aazmaish mein daalta hai. Aur zaroor woh qayamat ke roz tumhare tamaam ikhtilafaat ki haqeeqat tumpar khol dega
